subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Track and Field
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: For Bryan Clay, a gold medal winner in Beijing in 2008 and once deemed the world’s greatest athlete, it’s difficult not to feel slighted by a life of near anonymity.
snippet: For Bryan Clay, a gold medal winner in Beijing in 2008 and once deemed the world’s greatest athlete, it’s difficult not to feel slighted by a life of near anonymity.
